speaking: ^???: Hallo. Wenn du das hier lesen kannst,
^dann können wir gleichzeitog am projekt arbeiten uwu

c-0: ^I really hope no children try to scare me today.
c-1: ^Those annoying kids always trying to get as much sugar as they can.

sus_blanket: ^You: I used to be a weird child.
^I sometimes took my bedsheet and used it as a ghost costume.
scissors_blanket: ^Those kids will never see this coming.
^I will scare them before they even have a chance.

otter_chitchat: ^Otter: I used to be a great sailor.
^I used to fight against huge seamonsters.

c-0: ^I've called her my green Lady. My green nemesis.
^The biggest sea creature I've ever seen.

dog_chitchat: ^Dog: I am a dog and I am scared of anything.
